[quote name="Comiskey" post=1846933]For sale- extremely rare Moonlight graham Rose Postcard. $4250

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=341380&d=1547927991[/IMG]

Please email me at [url]jeffissurfing@gmail.com[/url]

Very nice card. 

Email sent.

There is some good friendly debate about whether this is peaches graham not moonlight graham. But I promise that this is moonlight. Moonlight Graham played for Scranton during the time that this set was issued in the Scranton team was one of the teams that was issued.  I believe this is the only downer individual card and a milligram. There are a few other team postcards of Moonlight Graham while he play for Scranton. As far as I know there are only two examples of these that exist although I’m sure there may be others in other advanced collections. Please see pics below:

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=341431&d=1547952083[/IMG]

Jeff, after much research, I agree that this is not peaches graham and that it must be moonlight, as he was on Scranton in 1908 and the only graham on the team.

Per my email, I will take the card for $4250, if not already sold.

Moonlight... Peaches... nicknames certainly aren’t what they used to be! Sweet card!


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
